item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Life is the dancer and you are the dance." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "You can only lose something that you have, but you cannot lose something that you are." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Life isn't as serious as the mind makes it out to be." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "This, too, will pass." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "...whenever there is inspiration...and enthusiasm...there is a creative empowerment that goes far beyond what a mere person is capable of." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Love is a state of Being. Your love is not outside; it is deep within you. You can never lose it, and it cannot leave you." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?" -- Rumi

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "silence is the language of god, all else is poor translation." -- Rumi

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Henry van Dyke
item.description: "Time is Too Slow for those who Wait, Too Swift for those who Fear, Too Long for those who Grieve, Too Short for those who Rejoice; But for those who Love, Time is not." -- Henry van Dyke

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Mike Dooley
item.description: "Two people may suffer the same disappointment, one might be saddened, the other understanding. Two people may receive the same insult, one might be hurt, and the other compassionate. Two people may have the same disagreement, one might be angered, the other feel love. How you react to circumstances, people and things, IS A CHOICE, YOUR CHOICE... based on YOUR use of compassion, understanding and love." -- Mike Dooley

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Mike Dooley
item.description: "Thoughts Become Things... Choose The Good Ones!" -- Mike Dooley

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "The simple things are also the most extraordinary things, and only the wise can see them." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When I had nothing to lose, I had everything. When I stopped being who I am, I found myself." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "In love, no one can harm anyone else; we are each of us responsible for our own feelings and cannot blame someone else for what we feel. It hurt when I lost each of the various men I fell in love with. Now, though, I am convinced that no one loses anyone, because no one owns anyone. That is the true experience of freedom: having the most important thing in the world without owning it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Anyone who is in love is making love the whole time, even when they're not. When two bodies meet, it is just the cup overflowing. They can stay together for hours, even days. They begin the dance one day and finish it the next, or--such is the pleasure they experience--they may never finish it. No eleven minutes for them." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "You are what you believe yourself to be." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "We are travelers on a cosmic journey,stardust,swirling and dancing in the eddies and whirlpools of infinity. Life is eternal. We have stopped for a moment to encounter each other, to meet, to love, to share.This is a precious moment. It is a little parenthesis in eternity." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Our true friends are those who are with us when the good things happen. They cheer us on and are pleased by our triumphs. False friends only appear at difficult times, with their sad, supportive faces, when, in fact, our suffering is serving to console them for their miserable lives." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everything that happens once can never happen again. But everything that happens twice will surely happen a third time." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni
item.description: "In the end these things matter most: How well did you love? How fully did you live? How deeply did you let go?" -- Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni
item.description: "There is nothing more dreadful than the habit of doubt. Doubt separates people. It is a poison that disintegrates friendships and breaks up pleasant relations. It is a thorn that irritates and hurts; it is a sword that kills." -- Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Siddhārtha Gautama
item.description: "You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection" -- Siddhārtha Gautama

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Buddha
item.description: "Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most." -- Buddha

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Buddha
item.description: "If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete." -- Buddha

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Gautama Buddha
item.description: "NOTHING IS FOREVER EXCEPT CHANGE." -- Gautama Buddha

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "The wave does not need to die to become water. She is already water." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Putri Wilda Kirana add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description:
"Every faith in the world is based on fabrication. That is the definition of faith―acceptance of that which we imagine to be true, that which we cannot prove. Every religion describes God through metaphor, allegory, and exaggeration, from the early Egyptians through modern Sunday school. Metaphors are a way to help our minds process the unprocessible. The problems arise when we begin to believe literally in our own metaphors.
Should we wave a flag and tell the Buddhists that we have proof the Buddha did not come from a lotus blossom? Or that Jesus was not born of a literal virgin birth? Those who truly understand their faiths understand the stories are metaphorical." -- Dan Brown
